name: snappymail
description: SnappyMail is a lightweight self-hosted webmail client forked from RainLoop. It offers fast IMAP/SMTP mail access with theming and plugin support.
features: Webmail interface: Accesses email via modern, fast web interface.
IMAP and SMTP: Connects to any email server supporting standard protocols.
Multiple accounts: Manages multiple email accounts from single interface.
Contact management: Stores and organizes contacts with import/export support.
Folder management: Creates, renames, and organizes email folders.
Search functionality: Finds emails quickly with full-text search across mailboxes.
Attachment handling: Previews and downloads attachments with virus scanning support.
Theme customization: Chooses from multiple themes or creates custom designs.
Plugin system: Extends functionality with community and custom plugins.
Two-factor authentication: Secures access with 2FA support.
Mobile responsive: Adapts interface for smartphones and tablets.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigates and manages email efficiently with hotkeys.
